roleset_name: hold a captive in exchange for money, or pay for release of captive

roles.descr: entity paying for the release of the captive
roles.descr_trans: 支付释放俘虏费用的实体

roles.descr: terrible fate arg1 avoids via ransom
roles.descr_trans: arg1 通过赎金避免了可怕的命运

roleset_name_trans: 扣押俘虏以换取金钱，或支付释放俘虏的费用
